Award.AwardTitle: Support for Students to Attend the 31st Annual DAMOP Meeting
Award.AbstractNarration: This award provides support for student attendance at the annual meeting of the Division of Atomic, Molecular, and Optical Physics (DAMOP) to be held at the University of Connecticut, 14-17 June, 2000. This is the principal meeting covering principles of AMO physics held each year, and this award gives students the opportunity to participate in DAMOP sponsored events.
